mapper.select: select t1.tenantName, t2.name as trade, t1.address, t1.telephone, t1.linkName, t1.linkPhone from t_user t1, t_trade t2 where t1.id = #{id} and t1.trade = t2.id
select t1.id, t1.consumeMoney, t2.rate, t3.rule from t_gold_detail t1, t_rule t2, t_user t3 where t1.id = #{id} and t3.id = t1.userId and t3.rule = t2.id
update t_gold_detail set flag = '1', goldType = '1', goldNum = #{goldNum}, rule = #{rule}, confirmTime = now() where id = #{id}
